Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Bowl
Description: Bowl made with buff-coloured clay, with a rounded shape that narrows near the top. The lower extremity of the bowl is pointy and has a ring base 5 mm high. There are traces of horizontal brush strokes on the inside as well as remains of a white wash inside and outside. It is decorated with a continuous floral painted in black.
